00013 template<typename Container,typename Criteria>
00014 void erExtractPoints(IplImage * im,Container & pts,Criteria crit)
00015 {  
00016   typedef typename Container::value_type CvPoint;
00017   int a;
00018    for( int y = 0; y < im->height; y++)
00019     {
00020       int* ptr = (int*)(im->imageData + y*im->widthStep );
00021       for( int x = 0; x < im->width; x++)
00022         {
00023           a = ptr[x];
00024           if(crit(a))
00025             { CvPoint p;
00026               p.x = x;p.y = y;
00027               pts.push_back(p); 
00028             }
00029         }
00030     }
00031 };
